description:
Hello.

In all other works, please count on us.

Contact us today and we will make you happy!
 
 
------------------------------------------------ Some techy details:
• We optimise for IE, Chrome, Firefox, Safari on Windows, MacOS, iOS, Android
• We do PHP (WordPress, Laravel, Symfony, Yii), HTML5, JS (AJAX, JQuery, ExtJS, HTMLX, AngularJS, PhoneGap, NodeJS) MySQL, MongoDB
• We use in our work process Agile, Scrum, Kanban (in Jira, Trello, GitHub) GIT
• Communicate via e-mail, Skype, Slack, HipChat
